channel.title: SOULTIMATE with Andy Beggs
channel.description: A Dj Broadcaster of Soul & House Music
channel.itunes:subtitle: Soul....Jazz....House....... for your Soul
channel.itunes:author: ANDY BEGGS
channel.itunes:summary: A Dj Broadcaster of Soul & House Music

item.title: Gravity Free Volume 14 - Vocal & Soulful House Mixed By Andy Beggs
item.description: Catch the mixes on soul in the dales radio Damien J Carter Ft Darryl Dboneu - Climbing (Milk & Sugar Remix) (2010) Venue Connection - Hide & Seek (Dave Doyle Remix) (2012) At Jazz Ft Dawne B - Harmony (Little Big Bee Mix) (2000) DJ Kusala Ft Alana Bridgewater - Calling Me (DJ Kusalas Jump & Dance Vocal Mix) (2012) Bucie - Not Fade (Charles Webster Deeper Vocal Mix) (2012) Eltonnick Ft Naak - Move (Original Mix) (2011) At One Ft Wyoma - African Healing Dance (Atjazz Astro Remix) (2012) Greg Hosvan - Sensation (2012) Nathan X - Found Love (Main Mix) (2012) Angela Johnson - Get Myself Together (Souldynamic Remix) (2012) The Moodyfreaks & Donald Sheff - Wonderful (Main Vocal Mix) (2012) Love Over Money - Keep On (Restless Soul Instrumental) (2008) Industry - Release Me (Mark Gamble Extended Mix) (1995)
item.dc:creator: ANDY BEGGS
item.itunes:summary:
Catch the mixes on soul in the dales radio

item.title: Steppin' In Rhythm - Urban R&B & Soul Cuts Mixed By Andy Beggs
item.description: A 63 Min Mix of Some of the Best Urban R&B & Urban Soul...enjoy ! Al Lindsey - Keep On Getting On Electric Empire - Baby Your Lovin' (Chris Bangs Remix) Common - The Light Jaye - Don't Stop (Genie Remix) Frank McComb - The Things That You Do Tashan - After Hours Rachel Brown - Weekend (Fabio R&B Mix) Kendra Cash - Smile Solo - Blowing My Mind Nick Scotti - Wake Up Everybody Dennis Taylor - Smile Gerry Deveaux - Front Of The Line Victor Haynes - Less Than A Minute April Hill - The Search R.Kelly - Feeling Single SoulTrend - Just Dreaming Oezlem - Eyes Burn
item.dc:creator: ANDY BEGGS
item.itunes:summary:
A 63 Min Mix of Some of the Best Urban R&B & Urban Soul...enjoy !
Al Lindsey - Keep On Getting On Electric Empire - Baby Your Lovin' (Chris Bangs Remix) Common - The Light Jaye - Don't Stop (Genie Remix) Frank McComb - The Things That You Do Tashan - After Hours Rachel Brown - Weekend (Fabio R&B Mix) Kendra Cash - Smile Solo - Blowing My Mind Nick Scotti - Wake Up Everybody Dennis Taylor - Smile Gerry Deveaux - Front Of The Line Victor Haynes - Less Than A Minute April Hill - The Search R.Kelly - Feeling Single SoulTrend - Just Dreaming Oezlem - Eyes Burn

item.title: Pollution Free Volume 1 - Deep & Vocal House Mixed By Andy Beggs
item.description: In This Mix is some of the latest and soon to be released tracks with a couple of classics...enjoy ! Eyes of Love - My Love Is U (Frederico Conti Dub Mix) (2006) Soulmagic - Someone Like You (Original Mix) (2012) Ny Stomp - The NY House Track (2012) Jeff Fontaine & Deep Spelle - Higher Sensations(Forteba Remix) (2012) Afterhours - Waterfalls (4am Mix) (1993) Deck & Blacker - Redemption (2012) Klement Bonelli Robert Owens & Manoo - Too Little Too Late(Manoo Ambassadors Mix) (2012) Burning Tears - Got A Reason (Original Mix) (2012) Martin East Project Ft Canata - Far From This Place (Point % Dizzy Remix) (2012) Dovie Cote - Everything Good For You (Glenn Underground's Chi To NYC Mix) (2012) Martin Roth - Deep Style (Original Mix) (2011) Richard Earnshaw Vs Thelma Houston- My heart Needs Somebody (Bonna Bootleg) (2012) Miguel Migs Ft Meshell Ndegeocello (Fred Everything Lazy Vocal Mix) (2012)

item.title: Gravity Free Volume 13 - Vocal & Soulful House Mixed By Andy Beggs
item.description: Some of the latest soulful house released mixed with some of the classics.. enjoy and don't forget you can catch this mix and plenty of others on soul in the dales radio... http://www.soulinthedales.moonfruit.com/ Rasmus Faber Ft Clara Mendes - Demanda Part 2 (Miguel Migs Remix) (2008) Baggio Knows Best - Feeling Good (Drexmeister rework) (2012) Rune Feat Deme - Heartbroken (DJ Beloved's BPM Vocal Mix) (2012) Reel People Ft Sharlene Hector - The Rain (Rasmus Faber Club Mix) (2005) DJ Serge Negri - Night & Day (Gene King Remix) (2012) Cathy Battistessa - Une Nouvelle Humanite (Andy Comptons Peng Mix) (2012) Dj Groove Pres Soulpreachers Ft Nicole Mitchell - Summer Dreams (Shane D Remix) (2011) Viola Sykes - (My baby) He Loves Me(main Vocal Mix) (2012) Doll Combers Ft Sofia Rubina - Beautiful Face (Anthony Nicholson & Will Kurk Garage Soul Mix) (2011) John Crocket Ft Gwen Hunter - Invitation (John Crocketts Vocal Mix) (2012) Blaze - Found Love (Aaron Ross Mix) (2007)

item.title: Shared Consciousness - House Music Deep Within Mixed By Andy Beggs

item.title: Soultimate With Andy Beggs on soulsticeradio24.com Sunday 20th May 2012
item.description: The show goes out every Sunday 3pm till 5pm UK time on www.soulsticeradio24.com Nicole Mitchell - Flow (Strictly Biz Perfect Rhythm Remix) (2012) Dwele - Know Your Name (2005) Cool Million ft Westcoast Soulstars - We Can Work It Out (2012) Soul Trend - To Fall In Love Is So Easy (2012) Papik Ft Wendy D Lewis - Family Affair (2012) Andy McClean - Two Hearts (1995) Kindred The Family Soul - Where Would I Be (2005) Al McKenzie - Heaven (2012) NJ LadyFingers - Twisted Love (2012) Gregg Diamond Bionic Boogie Ft Luther Vandross - Hot Butterfly (1978) Ronnie McNeir - You Are Everything (1975) Lew Kirton - Talk To Me (1983) Brand New - A Thousand Years (1976) The Charisma Band - Ain't Nothing Like Your Love Keni Lewis - Ain't Gonna Make It Easy Margo Thunder - Mama Your Alright With Me (1974) The Mayberry Movement - I Think I'm In Love With You (1974) Sven Zetterberg - Heartache Was All I Got Masterplan - Dance All Night Sidney Joe Quales - I Don't Do This (1974) Lazarus - Brown Eyes (1971) J.R Bailey - That's Love (1977) Gene Townsel - I'm Walking Away (1978) Bobby Moore - Call Me Your Anything Man (1975) Bridge - Crying For Love (1981) Darrell Nulisch - Handle It With Care (2004) The 9th Creation - Sexy Girl (1975) Kalapana - Got To Find You Girl (1981) Betty Wright - Brick Grits (1977) Reid Inc- What Am I Gonna Do (1977) Will Hatcher - You Ain't Seen Nothing Yet Spencer Wiggins - Breaking Point (1969) Byrons Burns - Now That Your Gone (1977)

item.title: Gravity Free Volume 12 - Vocal Deep & Soulful House Mixed By Andy Beggs
item.description: This weeks mix broadcast on soul in the dales radio at 9PM UK time.. http://www.soulinthedales.moonfruit.com/ The Copasetic - Far Away (Main Mix) (2012) Seawind Project Ft Emily McEvan - Free (Knee Deep Classic) (2005) Jasper Street Company - Smile (Deepah Dub) (2000) DJ Chus & David Penn Ft Caterina - Baila (Dennis Ferrer Berentine Mix) (2003) Copyright - Zamyleda (2004) Gus Gus - VIP ( Masters At Work Vocal Mix) (1999) Jonny Montana Vs The Layabouts Ft Portia Monique - I Love You Better (Bonna Bootleg) (2012) LeftGusher, James Gicho - Be With You (Original Mix) (2012) Guiro Ft Angela Johnson - Free (2000) Soul ID - Believe (Will Reelsoul Vocal Mix) (2007) Lauhaus - Baobab (Delano Smith Remix) (2011) Miguel Migs Ft Fred Ross - Take Me To Paradise (Migs Deluxe Pusher Vocal Mix) (2010)

item.title: Gravity Free Volume 11 Plus - A One Off House Mix Broadcast on soulsticeradio24.com with Andy Beggs
